answers.answer: I'll be 34 weeks tomorrow and still working but I cut down on some hours because I'm being monitored for preeclampsia. I feel like my body can't take any more for sure... My baby is expected to weigh 9 pounds and my son who was 7 pounds got stuck on the way out. I don't know how I'm going to pass a 9 pound baby!

I'm feeling the same way. I'm 33 weeks and have a 4yr old.  My 4yr old was 8 lbs at delivery but this baby feels bigger. I'm still working too I might stop sooner than I think. These kicks and movement is getting the best of me!

question: I am so over being pregnant  right now i am 34 weeks with a boy and cannot wait to have him in my arms, i am working until the end because any time off i take now will be deducted  from my FMLA..i used to feel so bad but as i have read some posts i realize i am not the only one on this boat...sleep deprivation  is really getting to me i cannot function  at work and i have a 4 year old that requires all my attention  and i cannot just ignore  her...i am being induced on july 30th and i wish he would come on his own prior  to that date..ladies i just needed to vent i dont know how some women say they are at their best while pregnant  i have had such a hard hard pregnancy. ..are u experiencing something  similar??
title: im not the only one i see
